manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Vista L shaped Collectible Series can help you transform your office into an active, adaptable workspace.This special series offers a variety of tables colors.The beautiful work surface is finished in particle board with steel frames in a modern fashion powder coat finish design.Desk Tops are easy to clean. Adjustable leg glides can make the desks stay level on any kind of surface.Simple and easy to assemble.

Customized Drawer Sliding drawer can store your office supplies to keep your desk nice and neat.Adjustable dividers included to customize your storage space! Extra Large Shelf 30.25" 30.25" Extra Large Shelf not only can be a monitor raiser but also good to be a book shelf or put other items to extend your space.You can install the shelf on either the right or left according to your Preference. Z shaped design Made with strong steel with a fashionable coating that can compliment any room or office space.The Z-shaped design fortifies the strong and durable frame, resulting in long-term use. Heavy Duty Side Hooks Two steel hooks provided to hang your headphones, bags, or other accessories on each side.Each hook can hold up to 10 lbs.
OD-01B-E OD-02A-E OD-05A-E OD-09B-K OD-05C-K Size 51" x51" 51" x51" 60" x 55" 55" x 34.5" 48"X24" Design L-Shaped L-Shaped L-Shaped L-Shaped Standard

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Desk Purchase For the Price!
reviews.reviewText: So happy! It's perfect for my small space and sturdy. It doesn't wobblye on my tile floor and has an excellent footrest. High value for the price, and I've been sorely tempted to buy two.Highly quality appearance. I got walnut.It definitely was a two person job. Took over a half hour.We got the legs backwards at one point and were so relieved to be done by the end, we didn't both correcting that we installed one of the hooks upside down.Easy instructions. So much so that a ten-year old child helped me build it. :)Holds my HP touchscreen computer, though weighty, well. As you can see, I can fit a whole lot on it. Very sturdy for the job.Chic in appearance and great for organizing office supplies!All glory, praise, thanks, and all things be to God on the highest forever and ever in Jesus mighty and wonderful name. He's coming soon. He loves you. Believe this and repent. Join him.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice and spacious
reviews.reviewText: I have been work from home for about 3 years now (since Covid) and we aren’t going back to office. Been using what was essentially a glorified book shelf for a desk.I recently got a printer, and I had nowhere to keep it, so I had to make the plunge and invest in a larger workspace. I did not want to spend a fortune, and this desk is honestly way better than I could have anticipated. The “wood grain” effect is very attractive, and makes it look classy and professional. Assembly was incredibly easy, and I set it up on my own in just a few hours. Probably would have been less if not for my ADD 👀Fits great in my room, and it is so nice having the extra space- not only for my printer and work- but also room for other activities like writing, drawing, etc during downtime. I love having the elevated shelf for my monitor, and I am grateful that the placement was customizable. If the monitor shelf *had* to be on the other side (as pictured in the listing) it would have blocked my bed, and would not have worked for me (my office space is in my bedroom). It seems perfectly sturdy and I love that there is plenty of space underneath. My only critique would be that the drawer is essentially unusable due to how small the sections are. That being said, they are easily removed and I don’t see any reason why I can’t just take them out if I choose to use it.This is a fantastic desk, for a great price and I am very happy with my purchase. My daughter is jealous and wants one for her gaming station, so I may be getting another one in the future. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars simple and clean.
reviews.reviewText: ★★★★☆ Great Value for the Price!I recently purchased this $100 desk, and I must say, I am pleasantly surprised by its quality and functionality. For the price, it's a fantastic deal! Here's my take on the desk:Pros:1. Sturdy Construction: The desk feels quite robust and stable. I was worried that it might wobble, but it holds up well, even when I'm typing vigorously or placing heavier items on it.2. Easy Assembly: Putting this desk together was a breeze. The instructions were clear, and all the necessary tools were included. I managed to assemble it on my own within an hour.3. Spacious Surface: The desk provides ample space for my laptop, monitor, keyboard, and additional accessories. I can even spread out my paperwork comfortably.4. Aesthetic Design: I appreciate the simple and clean design of the desk. It fits well with my existing furniture and doesn't take up too much space in my small office area.Cons:1. Minor Scratches: When the desk arrived, I noticed a couple of small scratches on the surface. While they don't affect the functionality, it would have been nice to have a flawless surface.2. Limited Storage: The desk doesn't have drawers or shelves, so if you require extra storage, you might need to invest in a separate filing cabinet or organizer.Overall, this $100 desk is an excellent purchase. It serves its purpose well and meets my expectations. If you're looking for a budget-friendly option that still offers quality and functionality, I highly recommend considering this desk. Just be mindful of the possibility of minor imperfections upon arrival. Despite the minor cons, it has been a valuable addition to my home office setup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy and Fun to assemble
reviews.reviewText: Took me about 20-30mins to assemble and its beautiful. The quality of the desk is really good and this color specifically (espresso) was magnificent. Holds my whole pc setup perfectly.I also love the feature of being able to hang your headphones on the sides of the desk too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Overall this desk was a good buy. It is large and sturdy enough. The setup was super simple and the desk doesn’t wobble at all which is a huge plus for me. I would suggest getting help to move it to your desired location since dragging it across the floor could cause the rubber studs at the bottom to pop out. The studs are easy to put back in, but I would still advise against dragging. Now that the desk is up, I can get started on decorating my little office corner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best corner desk for the price
reviews.reviewText: I bought this desk for my boyfriend to set up his monitor and PS5. He really liked the quality and the space underneath for his feet, and the hook on the sides for him to set his headphones on. I also really like the shelf and the pull out drawer for pens and stuff. Will definitely purchase again if I need a new desk!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I wanted and expected
reviews.reviewText: This desk is light-weight and easy to assemble for a single person.It took me about 50 minutes to assemble it myself, and I only needed the tools provided, with one caveat.There were two holes that had metal shaving obstructions that prevented me from properly threading the screws. I used a drill bit to clear those and continue the assembly.It is definitely strong enough to hold the computer and books that I will be putting on it. Because it is mostly metal, it jiggles more than other desks that I have owned, but I am just fine with that.I would recommend this desk for a corner computer workstation/handwriting station in a small home office.
Llego todo bien, muy fácil de armar, el escritorio de excelente calidad. Lo recomiendo mucho.

Loved that this was a smaller size option which was perfect for our space. Assembly could not have been easier. Started it thinking my son would help me after school but I had it all done in a half hour. Very solid material. The smile on my son’s face when he saw it verified it all. It’s only a few days old but is well used. Great purchase.

El escritorio es de buena calidad no venia golpeado ni con defectos se ve muy bien y si vives en un apartamento con poco espacio y quieres algo Amplio esto está bien, lo único malo es que no se puede poner tanto peso (mi gabinete es grande y pesado así que se pandeaba muy poco) eso si, si no quieres batallar con el armado es mejor pedir ayuda (se puede armar solo es muy intuitivo el instructivo pero es más fácil con ayuda)
10/10 product.Easy to assemble with the manual.Easy to clean, despite it is in white colour.Best for its price

The media could not be loaded. This is an excellent option for a great, big desk without spending too much.All the colour is great a free of any defect. All the threads and bolts are in perfect shape and nothing gave any trouble.The instructions are clear and straightforward.The structure is completely sturdy.I am really happy with it and I recommend it to everyone.
